website_summaries.verdict: This extra-long mat is great alongside luxury tubs and transition areas in your bathroom.
pros: Made of natural bamboo with water-resistant coating and fabric border
Choice of dark or natural bamboo color
cons: Surface can get slick when water puddles on it

customer_reviews.title: Color??
customer_reviews.text: I really like this but the picture shows it being a dark bamboo color and when I received it, it was light in color. It’s fine I ordered the smaller one also and just hope they’re the same color. Why is the picture dark?
customer_reviews.author: KimCatk

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: This mat is in no way water resistant. I am using it on the outside of a walk in tiled shower and we needed something large and “water resistant” since the mist oversprays out on the floor where a fabric mat would need dried following each shower I thought this was the solution but it’s not. Water absorbs into each crack and molded on the underside.
customer_reviews.author: shane

customer_reviews.title: Not Mocha Brown
customer_reviews.text: This is a light typical bamboo color not mocha brown which is what I wanted debating on wether to return it ot not.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a dark brown mat. I was sent a light, tan mat. Not at all what the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this mat (have just received it in the mail ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat (have just received it in the mail last week), I think it looks even better in real life than in the pictures. It keeps my feet from getting cold and it is nice and long. I think it's a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: I did notice that it can become slick when wet but I feel like the texture of the bamboo prevents me from falling ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a tubside mat to prevent slipping and wet floors. It is absolutely well made and does not slip on my linoleum whatsoever. I did notice that it can become slick when wet but I feel like the texture of the bamboo prevents me from falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: It works very well, but indeed a lighter, neutral bamboo color like others indicated
customer_reviews.text: It is good if you are mentally prepared to receive an item that is lighter color as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Cen

customer_reviews.title: Reordering is the best review!!
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews even though I am very pleased with the product. The fact that I reordered the bamboo mat speaks for itself!!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Just as some of the other reviewers said, the mat came in the wrong color. The packaging says mocha, but the mat is natural. It is okay, but not what I wanted or was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Great for bathrooms.
customer_reviews.text: While the product is slightly thinner than I expected, they are very well-constructed and certainly do the job.
customer_reviews.author: JAMR

customer_reviews.title: If only it were the right color
customer_reviews.text: Although the product is great quality, it is NOT the same color depicted. I ordered this in a mocha brown, recieved a light bamboo color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo much lighter than the photograph! This matches nothing in my house anywhere. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: They sent me the wrong color.. and then did it again.
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this higher.. but they sent me the wrong color twice so I’m not sure how the mocha looks
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not color shown
customer_reviews.text: Not the color shown in description. I wanted the darker color for a high traffic area. Way too light. It’s a bummer☹️Seems cheap and it’s shiny.
customer_reviews.author: caligirl

customer_reviews.title: too slippery
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this looks. It's great looking and makes the room look tropical. BUT....it has no backing to it so when you step on it, it slides. I almost fell so decided to return it. If they could changed that, I would keep.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my kitchen . It is easy to clean and maintain and keeps water drops from the floor. The length is just right. It works well in my décor and would work in almost any style design.
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: Way better than carpet
customer_reviews.text: Way better than traditional rugs for the bathroom. My door easily glides over it, getting it wet when I get out of the shower isn’t an issue and my vacuum easily goes over it. I was worried it wasn’t going to look good with my color scheme but it blends in very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Natural look
customer_reviews.text: Love it but they are slippery need ro buy something to put under it.
customer_reviews.author: ml beck

customer_reviews.title: Color not dark as picture
customer_reviews.text: Misrepresentation of color “Mocha” pictures shows dark when color is actually quite light. Easy return though
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J TabacoLeon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We got this to discourage our cat from pulling out the carpet Pieces on regular bath mats. It works great! Dries quickly and looks clean.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use these rugs so that I no longer have to pick up rugs to run my Roomba or to have to wash rugs. It's taken me to a new level of lazy!
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, doesn't handle water as well as I expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is fine, especially if you'll be placing it in a dry location. However it does tend to warp and curl when it gets wet, so I'll probably replace it with something else eventually. It does look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Roland H.

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo mat
customer_reviews.text: Love the bamboo mat Very nice looking but not sure about non skid features Used in my bedroom
customer_reviews.author: D. Blosser

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but keep in mind they are shiney
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo mat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected and product was as advertised. The size is perfect for the vanity and fits in well with the Zen theme in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't call it super high quality but the color was spot on and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call it super high quality but the color was spot on and it's holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Lays well. Even on carpet. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: d1801

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Only have 4 stars because some of the stitching has started to unravel
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Loved it - It arrived on time and looks beautiful and is exactly as shown. Would definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: bathroom huh?
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. I just don't understand how it is for a bathroom. Doesn't say anything about bathroom on the packaging. It's a fine mat, just not for a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff O.

product_meta.title: mDesign Water-Resistant Bamboo Floor Mat for Bathroom - Extra Large, Mocha Brown
feature_bullets: Dark bamboo floor mat for in front of the shower, bathtub or vanity
Ideal for bathrooms, kitchens or anywhere in the home
Traditional, fresh style complements any home decor
Made of natural bamboo with water-resistant coating and fabric border

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars66 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
